title: Diagnostic Strategies Using AI and ML in Cardiovascular Diseases: Challenges
details: N Rana, K Sharma, A Sharma - Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Models and …
abstract: Cardiovascular diseases are the primary basis of mortality on a global scale and pose a significant threat to human well-being. CVD was responsible for causing 17.6 million fatalities in the year 2016, indicating a notable increase of 14.5% over the …

title: Artificial Intelligence-derived Vascular Age from Photoplethysmography: A Novel Digital Biomarker for Cardiovascular Health
details: G Nie, Q Zhao, G Tang, Y Li, S Hong - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.12990, 2025
abstract: With the increasing availability of wearable devices, photoplethysmography (PPG) has emerged as a promising non-invasive tool for monitoring human hemodynamics. We propose a deep learning framework to estimate vascular age (AI-vascular age) …
